# projectdashboard

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/jersme/project_dashboard/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/jersme/project_dashboard?branch=master)
[![R build status](https://github.com/jersme/project_dashboard/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/jersme/project_dashboard/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of projectdashboard is to create a project dashboard to keep track of 
product development on GitHub/

## Installation

The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jersme/project_dashboard")
```
